amendment.description: To strike a provision modifying the definition of hemp for purposes of the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3941 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 24. Record Vote Number: 614.
Amendment SA 3941 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3937. To strike a provision modifying the definition of hemp for purposes of the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3941 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3937.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3941 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 24. Record Vote Number: 614.
